metadata.synopsis: Default dialogue with Ironfinger, one of the Skull Lashers in the Colony Barracks. Overseen by Krustine, Mistress of Souls. Shouldn't have too much to say. A female halfling. (Myrkulite)
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/SCL_Main_A- Go to the Colony Barracks with "goto 728 16 14"- Let the Mistress of Souls finish blessing the Skull Lashers. Do not come too close or interfere.- Talk to Ironfinger after Krustine's blessing AD has finished.- If you attacked Ketheric on the Moonrise rooftop before coming to Colony, the Myrkulites will be hostile to you on sight.

0.speaker: Ironfinger
0.text: We are fortunate to live in the end-times. Pray with me.

1.speaker: Ironfinger
1.text: The end is coming - do you feel it?
